name: Iron Man
subtitle: The Armored Avenger
description: A billionaire genius who dons a suit of armor to protect the world as Iron Man.

name: Captain America
subtitle: The First Avenger
description: A super soldier from World War II who fights for justice and freedom with his iconic shield.

name: Ant-Man
subtitle: The Size-Shifting Hero
description: A hero who can shrink to the size of an ant while maintaining his strength, using advanced technology.

name: Black Panther
subtitle: The King of Wakanda
description: The ruler of the advanced African nation of Wakanda, who defends his people as Black Panther.

name: Black Widow
subtitle: The Master Spy
description: A highly trained former spy and Avenger who uses her skills and intelligence to fight against evil.

name: Captain Marvel
subtitle: The Galactic Warrior
description: A powerful hero with cosmic abilities, fighting to protect Earth and the universe.

name: Hawkeye
subtitle: The Master Archer
description: A highly skilled marksman and archer, known for his precision and bravery as an Avenger.

name: Hulk
subtitle: The Green Goliath
description: A brilliant scientist who transforms into a powerful green giant when angered, known as the Hulk.
